News.Title: Pelatro Secures $2.1M Contract with Middle Eastern Telecom Company
News.Summary: Pelatro has been selected by a telecommunications company in the Middle East to provide its mViva Campaign Management Solution. The contract is valued at $2.1 million and will span over a period of 3 years. Pelatro, with a market capitalization of 469 crore, will supply this solution to enhance the telco's marketing capabilities.
